fullText:
Learned something from @kevinolearytv today, something he learned from Steve Jobs.

Every day, Jobs focused on just 3–5 things.
That was his signal (80%).
Everything else? Noise (20%).

This made me realize my success depends on how well I protect my signal from the noise.

fullText:
MySQL 8 支持的特性Invisible Column 还是有很多场景适用的： 
1.向后兼容：保证 select * from 该字段不被查询出来。 
2.临时或内部列：用作 ETL、计算、迁移中间值的存储，不被业务 SQL 访问。
3.减少查询误用：不希望被常规查询误取，但在特定 SQL 中需要使用。
#DataCollie 表设计器支持这个属性。
